Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 22 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Tendril, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 50ft, Grapples on a hit

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Roper makes 4 attacks with its Tendrils, uses Reel and makes one Bite attack
Other Actions.Action 2: Reel, The Roper pulls each creature grappled by it straight towards it

Abilities.Ability 1: False Appearance, While the Roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite
Abilities.Ability 2: Grasping Tendrils, The Roper can have up to 6 tendrils at a time, which can be attacked individually.  The Roper can regrow lost tendrils as an action
Abilities.Ability 3: Spider Climb, The Roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check
